title: WWDC 2022: Third Swift Student Challenge requires Swift Playgrounds 4 project
content:
Alongside WWDC 2022 date, Apple is also announcing its third Swift Student Challenge. Not only do winners get some nice pins, but they also can receive an award or a WWDC Scholarship. Here’s everything you need to know about the competition.

more…

The post WWDC 2022: Third Swift Student Challenge requires Swift Playgrounds 4 project appeared first on 9to5Mac.
